welcome_modal.title: JTI Godda mein aapka Swagat hai!
welcome_modal.greeting: Namaste! Chaliye, aapko hamari tech ki duniya explore karne ke liye set up karte hain.

home_page.hero_title: JTI Godda ke saath apna Future Unlock karein
home_page.hero_subtitle: Technology mein ek safal career ke liye aapka gateway. Hum next generation ke IT professionals ko empower karne ke liye top-tier computer education dete hain.
home_page.why_jti_subtitle: Hum practical skills aur career readiness par focus ke saath best learning experience dene ke liye committed hain.
home_page.expert_instructors_desc: Anubhavi industry professionals se seekhein jo padhane ke liye passionate hain.
home_page.practical_curriculum_desc: Hamare courses hands-on experience aur real-world skills dene ke liye design kiye gaye hain.
home_page.job_assistance_desc: Hum graduation ke baad aapko apna career launch karne mein madad ke liye placement support dete hain.
home_page.featured_courses_subtitle: Hamare sabse popular courses ke saath shuruaat karein, jo sabhi skill levels ke liye design kiye gaye hain.

testimonials.review: JTI ka Web Development course mere liye game-changer tha. Hands-on projects aur expert guidance ne mujhe apne passion ko follow karne aur ek professional web developer banne ka confidence diya.
testimonials.author: AKASH AKM (AkmXStar)

testimonials.review: ADCA program bahut hi detail mein hai. Maine basic computing se lekar advanced applications tak sab kuch seekha. Faculty bahut supportive hai aur hamesha doubts clear karne ke liye taiyar rehti hai.
testimonials.author: Pradip Kumar

testimonials.review: JTI ke baare mein mujhe sabse achhi baat practical skills par focus lagi. ADCA course sirf theory nahi tha; isne mujhe IT industry ke real-world challenges ke liye taiyar kiya.
testimonials.author: Rohit Kumar

testimonials.review: JTI mein learning environment excellent hai. Teachers knowledgeable hain, aur job assistance program ne sach mein mujhe course ke turant baad ek behtareen position haasil karne mein madad ki.
testimonials.author: Jeewant Gupta

courses_page.title: Hamare Courses
courses_page.subtitle: Technology mein apne career ko kickstart ya advance karne ke liye perfect course dhundhein.

about_page.title: JTI Godda ke Baare Mein
about_page.subtitle: 2001 se quality technical education ke zariye Jharkhand ke youth ko empower kar rahe hain.
about_page.mission_desc: Godda aur aas-paas ke areas ke students ko accessible, affordable, aur high-quality computer education dena. Hamara maqsad unhe hamesha badalte IT industry mein safal hone ke liye zaroori practical skills aur knowledge se लैस karna hai.
about_page.history_desc: 12 January, 2001 ko sthapit, Jharkhand Technical Institute (JTI) Private Limited digital divide ko kam karne ke vision ke saath shuru hua tha. Pichhle do dashakon mein, humne hazaron students ko safaltapoorvak train kiya hai, unhe jobs paane aur ek achha career banane mein madad ki hai.
about_page.corporate_info_subtitle: Hum transparency ke saath kaam karte hain aur ek registered private limited company hain.
about_page.asc_office_address: Gayatri Nagar, Nahar Chowk, Kanchankala Niketan, Godda, Jharkhand 814133
about_page.directors_subtitle: JTI Godda ko behtareen banane wali leadership team se milein.
about_page.faculty_subtitle: Hamare students ko guide karne wali anubhavi aur samarpit team.

contact_page.title: Humse Judein
contact_page.subtitle: Hum yahan madad ke liye hain! Agar aapke paas hamare courses ke baare mein sawaal hain ya guidance chahiye, to bejhijhak sampark karein.
contact_page.asc_address_value: Gayatri Nagar, Nahar Chowk, Kanchan kala Niketan, Godda, Jharkhand 814133

contact_form.message_placeholder: Bataein hum kaise madad kar sakte hain...
contact_form.success_desc: Humse contact karne ke liye dhanyavaad. Hum jald hi aapse sampark karenge.

login_page.title: Student Login
login_page.description: Apne account mein login karne ke liye neeche apna email daalein
login_page.success_desc: Aapko aapke dashboard par redirect kiya ja raha hai...

forgot_password_page.title: Password Bhool Gaye
forgot_password_page.description: Chinta na karein, hum aapko reset instructions bhej denge. Submit karne ke baad, please apna email inbox (aur spam folder) check karein.
forgot_password_page.success_desc: Password reset karne ke liye please apna email check karein.
forgot_password_page.error_desc: Reset link nahi bhej paaye. Please email check karke dubara try karein.

admission_page.title: Admission Application Form
admission_page.description: Apply karne ke liye neeche diya gaya form bharein. Aapki application hamari team dwara review ki jayegi.
admission_page.course_placeholder: Apply karne ke liye ek course chunein
admission_page.success_desc: Aapki acknowledgement receipt generate ho rahi hai.

dashboard_page.subtitle: Yahan JTI Godda ke saath aapki profile aur billing ka overview hai.
dashboard_page.card_desc: Apne invoices aur payment status track karein.
dashboard_page.no_bills: Aapke paas abhi tak koi bills nahi hain.
dashboard_page.no_receipts: Aapke paas abhi tak koi receipts nahi hain.
dashboard_page.payment_toast_desc: Aapko bill {billNumber} ke liye pay karne ke liye redirect kiya ja raha hai. (Yeh ek demo hai)

careers_page.title: Career Profile
careers_page.description: Please yeh detailed form bharein. Yeh information humein aapke course complete hone ke baad potential job opportunities se connect karne mein madad karegi.
careers_page.no_profile_error: Aapka admission profile nahi mila. Please support se contact karein.
careers_page.fetch_error: Aapka profile data fetch karne mein error aaya.
careers_page.card_desc: Job placements ke liye consider kiye jaane ke liye apni detailed profile complete karein.

careers_form.success_desc: Aapka career profile successfully save ho gaya hai.
careers_form.same_as_local: Permanent Address, Local Address jaisa hi hai.
careers_form.declaration_text: Main yahan declare karta hoon ki upar di gayi jaankari meri behtareen jaankari aur vishwas ke anusaar sach, poori aur sahi hai.
careers_form.instruction_1: Is form ke saath 10th std aur 12th std ki attested photocopy marks sheet attach karein.
careers_form.instruction_2: Form mein di gayi jagah par passport size colour photograph lagayein.
careers_form.instruction_4: Fee saalana basis par badal sakti hai, 8 se 10% ki badhotri ke saath.
careers_form.instruction_5: Main Institute ke rules aur regulations ka paalan karne ka wada karta hoon.
careers_form.instruction_7: Aakhri qualifying examination ki attested photocopies (mark sheets).
careers_form.instruction_9: Do passport size photographs (form par lagaye gaye photo ke alawa).

enquiry_page.title: Enquiry Form
enquiry_page.description: Koi sawaal hai? Neeche diya gaya form bharein aur hamari team ka ek member jald hi aapse contact karega.

enquiry_form.same_address_label: Mera permanent address mere current address jaisa hi hai.
enquiry_form.success_desc: Aapki ruchi ke liye dhanyavaad. Aapki acknowledgement receipt generate ho rahi hai.
enquiry_form.error_desc: Aapki enquiry submit karne mein problem hui. Please dobara try karein.

image_gallery_page.title: Image Gallery
image_gallery_page.subtitle: JTI Godda ki life ki ek jhalak.

video_gallery_page.title: Video Gallery
video_gallery_page.subtitle: Hamare student testimonials, events, aur bhi bahut kuch dekhein.

footer.about_jti: Technology mein ek safal career ke liye aapka gateway, next generation ke IT professionals ko empower karne ke liye top-tier computer education pradan karta hai.

cca.title: Certificate in Computer Application (CCA)
cca.description: Computer operations aur zaroori office apps ka 3-mahine ka intro course.

dca.title: Diploma in Computer Application (DCA)
dca.description: Computer fundamentals, MS Office, aur internet skills par 6-mahine ka course.

adca.title: Advanced Diploma in Computer Application (ADCA)
adca.description: 1-saal ka program jisme DCA, Tally, DTP, aur C programming ka intro shamil hai.

tally.title: Tally Prime with GST
tally.description: Accounting aur GST ke liye Tally Prime mein 3-mahine ka specialized course.

dtp.title: Desktop Publishing (DTP)
dtp.description: Photoshop, CorelDRAW, aur PageMaker ke saath professional layout design seekhein.

typing_en.title: English Typing Course
typing_en.description: Structured lessons ke saath fast aur accurate English typing skills develop karein.

typing_hi.title: Hindi Typing (Mangal/Krutidev)
typing_hi.description: Professional kaam ke liye Mangal aur Krutidev fonts par Hindi typing mein master banein.

web.title: Web Development Basics
web.description: Web development ka introduction jisme HTML, CSS, aur JavaScript cover kiya gaya hai.

python.title: Python Programming
python.description: Versatile Python language seekhein, basic syntax se lekar advanced topics tak.

java.title: Java Programming
java.description: Majboot, enterprise-level applications banane ke liye Java mein gehri jaankari.

cpp.title: C++ Programming
cpp.description: High-performance applications aur systems programming ke liye C++ mein master banein.

cs11.title: Computer Science (Class 11th)
cs11.description: Class 11th Computer Science ke liye CBSE/JAC curriculum-based coaching.

cs12.title: Computer Science (Class 12th)
cs12.description: Class 12th Computer Science board exams ke liye advanced coaching.

it.title: Information Technology (IT)
it.description: Hardware, software, aur networking jaise IT fundamentals ko cover karne wala ek broad course.

ites.title: IT Enabled Services (ITES)
ites.description: BPO, KPO, aur doosre business processes jaise IT-enabled services ke baare mein seekhein.

cca.long_description: Beginners ke liye computer hardware, software, aur MS Office suite ki basics se parichit hone ke liye ek foundational course.
cca.syllabus: Computer Fundamentals|Operating System (Windows)|MS Paint & WordPad|MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)|Internet & Email

dca.long_description: Yeh diploma office mein use hone wale computer applications ki gehri samajh deta hai, jisme fundamentals se lekar advanced MS Office skills shamil hain.
dca.syllabus: Sabhi CCA topics|Advanced Excel & PowerPoint|MS Access ke saath Database concepts|Financial Accounting ka Parichay|Project Work

adca.long_description: Hamara flagship ek saal ka program jo computer applications, accounting software, design tools, aur programming basics ki gehri study offer karta hai.
adca.syllabus: Sabhi DCA topics|GST ke saath Tally Prime|DTP (Photoshop, CorelDRAW)|C Programming ka Parichay|Personality Development|Final Project

tally.long_description: Tally Prime par hamare focused course ke saath ek certified accounting professional banein, jisme poora GST compliance shamil hai.
tally.syllabus: Accounting Basics|Company Creation & Configuration|Ledgers & Vouchers|Inventory Management|GST Setup & Returns|Payroll|Reporting & Analysis

dtp.long_description: Hamare Desktop Publishing course ke saath apni creativity ko nikharein. Professional graphics, brochures, aur layouts design karna seekhein.
dtp.syllabus: Design Principles|Adobe Photoshop|CorelDRAW|Adobe PageMaker|Scanning & Printing Techniques|Project Work

typing_en.long_description: Systematic practice aur guided lessons ke zariye English typing mein apni speed aur accuracy badhayein.
typing_en.syllabus: Keyboard Layout|Touch Typing Technique|Word Drills & Sentence Practice|Paragraph Typing|Speed & Accuracy Tests

typing_hi.long_description: Mangal (Remington/Inscript) aur Krutidev dono fonts par Hindi typing mein maharat haasil karein, jo kai sarkari aur private jobs ke liye zaroori hai.
typing_hi.syllabus: Keyboard par Devanagari Script|Krutidev Font Typing|Mangal Font (Remington & Inscript)|Speed Building Exercises|Complex Passages

web.long_description: Web development mein apna pehla kadam rakhein. Yeh course static websites banane ke liye zaroori frontend technologies ko cover karta hai.
web.syllabus: Web ka Parichay|HTML5|CSS3 (Flexbox & Grid sahit)|JavaScript (ES6+)|DOM Manipulation|Final Project: Ek personal portfolio website

python.long_description: Python seekhein, duniya ki sabse popular programming languages mein se ek, bilkul shuru se. Beginners aur thode programming experience walon ke liye suitable.
python.syllabus: Python Basics (Variables, Data Types)|Control Structures|Functions & Modules|Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)|File Handling|Libraries ka Parichay (NumPy, Pandas)

java.long_description: Java par ek comprehensive course, jo object-oriented principles aur platform-independent applications banane par focused hai.
java.syllabus: Core Java Concepts|Java mein OOP (Inheritance, Polymorphism)|Exception Handling|Multithreading|UI ke liye Swing/AWT|Database Connectivity ke liye JDBC

cpp.long_description: Powerful C++ language mein maharat haasil karein, jiska istemal game development, high-performance computing, aur system software mein khoob hota hai.
cpp.syllabus: C++ Fundamentals|Pointers & Memory Management|Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)|Standard Template Library (STL)|File I/O|Data Structures

cs11.long_description: Class 11th ke Computer Science students (CBSE/JAC board) ke liye specialized coaching, jisme practicals ke saath poora syllabus cover hota hai.
cs11.syllabus: Computer Systems & Organisation|Computational Thinking & Programming - 1 (Python)|Data Management - 1 (SQL)|Society, Law, and Ethics - 1

cs12.long_description: Apni Class 12th board exams ke liye hamari gehri Computer Science coaching (CBSE/JAC) ke saath taiyari karein, jo concepts aur problem-solving par focused hai.
cs12.syllabus: Computational Thinking & Programming - 2 (Advanced Python)|Computer Networks|Data Management - 2 (Advanced SQL)|SQL ke saath Python Interface

it.long_description: Information Technology field ka ek broad overview, un students ke liye ideal jo IT landscape ki general samajh chahte hain.
it.syllabus: Computer Hardware & Peripherals|Software & Operating Systems|Computer Networks & Internet|Cyber Security Basics|IT mein Naye Trends

ites.long_description: Yeh course students ko tezi se badhte IT Enabled Services sector mein careers ke liye taiyar karta hai, jisme communication aur process knowledge par focus hai.
ites.syllabus: BPO/KPO ka Parichay|Customer Service Skills|Communication & Soft Skills|Data Entry & Processing|CRM software ka Parichay
